links.title: ViacomCBS could be a takeover target amid media merger frenzy, analyst says in double upgrade
links.description: ViacomCBS Inc. may be a "relatively sub-scale player" in the media landscape, but that could also make the company a takeover target, according to an analyst. Bank of America Merrill Lynch analyst Jessica Reif Ehrlich upgraded ViacomCBS shares two notches Thursday, to buy from underperform, amid further media industry consolidation.

body:
@nrhgd9 I think it's unlikely. 
 
$NFLX traded on subscriber growth, not revenue or profit. Subscribers growth missed badly and they also acknowledged more competition, which are drastic changes. Hence the shakedown. 
 
$AAPL rests on service and iPhone revenues. Both show no sign of slowing and even if they disappoint, will not be to degree of $NFLX subscriber growth. 
 
For $MSFT, it's all about cloud and channel checks have been solid. $ATVI deal has been completely washed over by market. Management will have a chance to spin that on the CC. 
 
$TSLA is about car deliveries and they released good numbers this month. The earning is pretty much known by now. 
 
Also, $AAPL and $MSFT multiples are a lot lower than $NFLX going into earnings. I see the biggest risk being a hawkish Fed on 1/26. My prediction is max drawdown of 10% if shit hits the fan
